    • 方法详细资料

      • eventEmitInterval

        public DefaultEventPublisherOptions.Builder eventEmitInterval(Duration eventEmitInterval)
        Sets the emit interval and the interval unit. Event emission will be disabled if the eventEmitInterval is set to 0}. Defaults to 10} TimeUnit.MINUTES. See DefaultEventPublisherOptions.DEFAULT_EMIT_INTERVAL DefaultEventPublisherOptions.DEFAULT_EMIT_INTERVAL_UNIT.
        参数:
        eventEmitInterval - the event interval, must be greater or equal to 0}
        返回:
        this
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0

      • eventEmitInterval

        @Deprecated
public DefaultEventPublisherOptions.Builder eventEmitInterval(long eventEmitInterval,
                                                                          TimeUnit eventEmitIntervalUnit)
        已过时。 since 5.0, use eventEmitInterval(Duration)
        Sets the emit interval and the interval unit. Event emission will be disabled if the eventEmitInterval is set to 0}. Defaults to 10} TimeUnit.MINUTES. See DefaultEventPublisherOptions.DEFAULT_EMIT_INTERVAL DefaultEventPublisherOptions.DEFAULT_EMIT_INTERVAL_UNIT.
        参数:
        eventEmitInterval - the event interval, must be greater or equal to 0}
        eventEmitIntervalUnit - the TimeUnit for the interval, must not be null
        返回:
        this

        返回:
